tooltip.endupdate.endersteel_sword.toolt:
§6Ability: §dEchoes of the Void
§fGrants a §a20% §fchance for a second Echo attack to strike the enemy §a1s §fafter the initial strike.
tooltip.endupdate.endersteel_axe.tooltip:
§6Ability: §dEchoes of the Void
§fInstantly destroys adjacent log blocks when breaking a log with this axe in your mainhand. (Capped at §a27 §fblocks)
tooltip.endupdate.endersteel_hoe.tooltip:
§6Ability: §dEchoes of the Void
§fReplants the crop broken using this hoe §eautomatically §fwith another seed from your §eoffhand§f.
